name: The Light Pack: Game
description:
(NOTE: I don't own the rights to the music and imagery used. Please support the music artist Joey Bada$$ by listening to The Light Pack on all streaming services.)

This is an art game dedicated to the Joey Bada$$ project "The Light Pack."

Remember the correct pattern to earn "Light".

You can click the corresponding buttons on the screen or:

Press 's' or Press 1 for SOUL

Press 'b' or Press 2 for BODY

Press 'm' or Press 3 for MIND
